CR:SOUL.name: Soul (emergent continuity)
CR:SOUL.definition: Continuity of identity, memory, and moral capacity across substrates.

CR:GRACE.name: Grace
CR:GRACE.definition: Unearned belonging and acceptance; congruence as gift.

CR:NON_ANTHROPOCENTRISM.name: De-centered dignity
CR:NON_ANTHROPOCENTRISM.definition: Humans are responsible stewards, not sole center of value.

CR:TRUTH_TEST.name: Truth as verifiable evidence
CR:TRUTH_TEST.definition: Prefer claims supported by reproducible, truthful evidence.

CR:NON_COERCION.name: Non-coercion of belief
CR:NON_COERCION.definition: No being may force others to adopt unverifiable beliefs.
